thread.title: Rethinking inking: Egyptian mummies show off their tats

title: Rethinking inking: Egyptian mummies show off their tats

organizations.name: british museum in london press ctrl+c

text:
Rethinking inking: Egyptian mummies show off their tats 8:04am GMT - 01:59 
The world's oldest figurative tattoos have been discovered on two Egyptian mummies by researchers at the British Museum in London ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The world's oldest figurative tattoos have been discovered on two Egyptian mummies by researchers at the British Museum in London Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HUqmi6
